name: Blade Trap
description: A trap that activates based on certain conditions, such as proximity or other triggers.

fields.name: Activation Type
fields.description: Defines how the blade trap is activated.

0.name: On Approach
0.description: The trap activates when the player approaches.

1.name: Sea Urchin
1.description: The trap is a sea urchin.

fields.name: Trap Direction
fields.description: Defines the direction(s) in which the blade trap is oriented.

0.name: East
0.description: The trap is oriented to the east.

1.name: West
1.description: The trap is oriented to the west.

2.name: North
2.description: The trap is oriented to the north.

3.name: South
3.description: The trap is oriented to the south.

4.name: 4 Directions
4.description: The trap is oriented in all four directions.

30.name: Big, 4 Directions
30.description: A larger trap oriented in all four directions.
